   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia_trans_access_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: 
   25: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   26:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   27:          all/0, groups/0]).
   28: 
   29: -export([write/1, read/1, wread/1, delete/1,
   30:          delete_object_bag/1, delete_object_set/1,
   31:          match_object/1, select/1, select14/1, all_keys/1, transaction/1, transaction_counters/1,
   32:          basic_nested/1, mix_of_nested_activities/1,
   33:          nested_trans_both_ok/1, nested_trans_child_dies/1,
   34:          nested_trans_parent_dies/1, nested_trans_both_dies/1,
   35:          index_match_object/1, index_read/1,index_write/1, index_delete_object/1,
   36:          index_update_set/1, index_update_bag/1,
   37:          add_table_index_ram/1, add_table_index_disc/1,
   38:          add_table_index_disc_only/1, create_live_table_index_ram/1,
   39:          create_live_table_index_disc/1,
   40:          create_live_table_index_disc_only/1, del_table_index_ram/1,
   41:          del_table_index_disc/1, del_table_index_disc_only/1,
   42:          idx_schema_changes_ram/1, idx_schema_changes_disc/1,
   43:          idx_schema_changes_disc_only/1]).
   44: 
   45: -export([do_nested/1]).
   46: 
   47: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   48: 
   49: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   50:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   51: 
   52: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   53:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   54: 
   55: -define(receive_messages(Msgs), mnesia_recovery_test:receive_messages(Msgs, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   56: 
   57: % First Some debug logging
   58: -define(dgb, true).
   59: -ifdef(dgb).
   60: -define(dl(X, Y), ?verbose("**TRACING: " ++ X ++ "**~n", Y)).
   61: -else.
   62: -define(dl(X, Y), ok).
   63: -endif.
   64: 
   65: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   66: all() ->
   67:     [write, read, wread, delete, delete_object_bag, delete_object_set,
   68:      match_object, select, select14, all_keys, transaction, transaction_counters,
   69:      {group, nested_activities}, {group, index_tabs},
   70:      {group, index_lifecycle}].
   71: 
   72: groups() ->
   73:     [{nested_activities, [],
   74:       [basic_nested, {group, nested_transactions},
   75:        mix_of_nested_activities]},
   76:      {nested_transactions, [],
   77:       [nested_trans_both_ok, nested_trans_child_dies,
   78:        nested_trans_parent_dies, nested_trans_both_dies]},
   79:      {index_tabs, [],
   80:       [index_match_object, index_read, {group, index_update},
   81:        index_write, index_delete_object]},
   82:      {index_update, [],
   83:       [index_update_set, index_update_bag]},
   84:      {index_lifecycle, [],
   85:       [add_table_index_ram, add_table_index_disc,
   86:        add_table_index_disc_only, create_live_table_index_ram,
   87:        create_live_table_index_disc,
   88:        create_live_table_index_disc_only, del_table_index_ram,
   89:        del_table_index_disc, del_table_index_disc_only,
   90:        {group, idx_schema_changes}]},
   91:      {idx_schema_changes, [],
   92:       [idx_schema_changes_ram, idx_schema_changes_disc,
   93:        idx_schema_changes_disc_only]}].
   94: 
   95: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   96:     Config.
   97: 
   98: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   99:     Config.
  100: 
  101: 
  102: %% Write records
  103: 
  104: write(suite) -> [];
  105: write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  106:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  107:     Tab = write,
  108:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  109:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  110: 
  111:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  112: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write([]) end)),
  113:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  114: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 2}) end)),
  115:     ?match({aborted, _},
  116: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({foo, 2}) end)),
  117:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  118: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 1, 2}) end)),
  119: 
  120:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:write({Tab, 1, 2})),
  121:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  122: 
  123: %% Read records
  124: 
  125: read(suite) -> [];
  126: read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  128:     Tab = read,
  129:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {type, bag}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  130:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  131: 
  132:     OneRec = {Tab, 1, 2},
  133:     TwoRec = {Tab, 1, 3},
  134:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  135: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:read([]) end)),
  136:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  137: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:read({Tab}) end)),
  138:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}}
  139: 	   ,  mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:read(OneRec) end)),
  140:     ?match({atomic, []},
  141: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:read({Tab, 1}) end)),
  142:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  143: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  144:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]},
  145: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:read({Tab, 1}) end)),
  146:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  147: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(TwoRec) end)),
  148:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec, TwoRec]},
  149: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:read({Tab, 1}) end)),
  150: 
  151:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:read({Tab, 1})),
  152:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  153: 
  154: %% Read records and set write lock
  155: 
  156: wread(suite) -> [];
  157: wread(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  158:     [_N1,N2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  159:     Tab = wread,
  160:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {type, set}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, Nodes}],
  161:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  162: 
  163:     OneRec = {Tab, 1, 2},
  164:     TwoRec = {Tab, 1, 3},
  165:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  166: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:wread([]) end)),
  167:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  168: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:wread({Tab}) end)),
  169:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}}
  170: 	   ,  mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:wread(OneRec) end)),
  171: 
  172:     ?match({atomic, []},
  173: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:wread({Tab, 1}) end)),
  174:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  175: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  176: 
  177:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]},
  178: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:wread({Tab, 1}) end)),
  179:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  180: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(TwoRec) end)),
  181:     ?match({atomic, [TwoRec]},
  182: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:wread({Tab, 1}) end)),
  183: 
  184:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:wread({Tab, 1})),
  185: 
  186:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  187: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Tab, {Tab, 42, a}, sticky_write) end)),
  188:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab,42, a}]},
  189: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [fun() -> mnesia:wread({Tab, 42}) end])),
  190:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  191: 
  192: %% Delete record
  193: 
  194: delete(suite) -> [];
  195: delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  196:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  197:     Tab = delete,
  198:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {type, bag}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  199:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  200: 
  201:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  202: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete([]) end)),
  203:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  204: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab}) end)),
  205:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}}
  206: 	   ,  mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab, 1, 2}) end)),
  207:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  208: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab, 1}) end)),
  209:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  210: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 1, 2}) end)),
  211:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  212: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab, 1}) end)),
  213:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  214: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 1, 2}) end)),
  215:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  216: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 1, 2}) end)),
  217:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  218: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab, 1}) end)),
  219: 
  220:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:delete({Tab, 1})),
  221:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  222: 
  223: %% Delete matching record
  224: 
  225: delete_object_bag(suite) -> [];
  226: delete_object_bag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  227:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  228:     ?match(ok, delete_object(Node1, bag)),
  229:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  230: 
  231: delete_object_set(suite) -> [];
  232: delete_object_set(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  233:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  234:     ?match(ok, delete_object(Node1, set)),
  235:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  236: 
  237: delete_object(Node1, Type) ->
  238:     Tab = delete_object,
  239:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {type, Type},
  240:               {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  241:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  242: 
  243:     OneRec = {Tab, 1, 2},
  244:     OtherRec = {Tab, 1, 3},
  245:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  246: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object([]) end)),
  247:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  248: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object({Tab}) end)),
  249:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _}},
  250: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object({Tab, 1}) end)),
  251:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  252: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object(OneRec) end)),
  253: 
  254:     %% Delete already existing object
  255:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  256: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  257:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  258: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
  259:                                       [OneRec] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  260:                                       ok = mnesia:delete_object(OneRec),
  261:                                       [] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  262:                                       ok
  263:                               end)),
  264:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 1)),
  265: 
  266:     %% Delete already existing object (written twice)
  267:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  268: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  269:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  270: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  271:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  272: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
  273:                                       [OneRec] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  274:                                       ok = mnesia:delete_object(OneRec),
  275:                                       [] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  276:                                       ok
  277:                               end)),
  278:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 1)),
  279: 
  280:     %% Delete object written in same transaction
  281:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  282: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
  283:                                       [] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  284:                                       ok = mnesia:write(OneRec),
  285:                                       ok = mnesia:delete_object(OneRec),
  286:                                       [] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  287:                                       ok
  288:                               end)),
  289:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 1)),
  290: 
  291:     %% Delete other object than written in same transaction
  292:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  293: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
  294:                                       [] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  295:                                       ok = mnesia:write(OneRec),
  296:                                       ok = mnesia:delete_object(OtherRec),
  297:                                       [OneRec] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  298:                                       ok
  299:                               end)),
  300:     ?match([OneRec], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 1)),
  301: 
  302:     %% Delete other object than already existing
  303:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  304: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
  305:                                       [OneRec] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  306:                                       ok = mnesia:delete_object(OtherRec),
  307:                                       [OneRec] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  308:                                       ok
  309:                               end)),
  310:     ?match([OneRec], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 1)),
  311: 
  312:     %% Delete object in combination with delete
  313:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  314: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
  315:                                       [OneRec] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  316:                                       ok = mnesia:delete({Tab, 1}),
  317:                                       ok = mnesia:delete_object(OtherRec),
  318:                                       [] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  319:                                       ok
  320:                               end)),
  321:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 1)),
  322: 
  323:     %% Several delete_object in same transaction (last on non existing record)
  324:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  325: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  326:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  327: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
  328:                                       [OneRec] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  329:                                       ok = mnesia:delete_object(OneRec),
  330:                                       ok = mnesia:delete_object(OtherRec),
  331:                                       [] = mnesia:read(Tab, 1),
  332:                                       ok
  333:                               end)),
  334:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 1)),
  335: 
  336:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:delete_object(OneRec)),
  337: 
  338:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab, _}},
  339: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object({Tab, {['_']}, 21}) end)),
  340:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab, _}},
  341: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object({Tab, {['$5']}, 21}) end)),
  342: 
  343:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
  344:     ok.
  345: 
  346: %% Read matching records
  347: 
  348: match_object(suite) -> [];
  349: match_object(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  350:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  351:     Tab = match,
  352:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  353:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  354: 
  355:     OneRec = {Tab, 1, 2},
  356:     OnePat = {Tab, '$1', 2},
  357:     ?match({atomic, []},
  358: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:match_object(OnePat) end)),
  359:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  360: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  361:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]},
  362: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:match_object(OnePat) end)),
  363: 
  364:     ?match({aborted, _},
  365: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:match_object({foo, '$1', 2}) end)),
  366:     ?match({aborted, _},
  367: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:match_object({[], '$1', 2}) end)),
  368: 
  369:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:match_object(OnePat)),
  370:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  371: 
  372: %% select
  373: select(suite) -> [];
  374: select(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  375:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  376:     Tab = match,
  377:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  378:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  379: 
  380:     OneRec = {Tab, 1, 2},
  381:     TwoRec = {Tab, 2, 3},
  382:     OnePat = [{{Tab, '$1', 2}, [], ['$_']}],
  383:     ?match({atomic, []},
  384: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:select(Tab, OnePat) end)),
  385:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  386: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  387:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  388: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(TwoRec) end)),
  389:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]},
  390: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:select(Tab, OnePat) end)),
  391: 
  392:     ?match({aborted, _},
  393: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:select(Tab, {match, '$1', 2}) end)),
  394:     ?match({aborted, _},
  395: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:select(Tab, [{'_', [], '$1'}]) end)),
  396: 
  397:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:select(Tab, OnePat)),
  398:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  399: 
  400: 
  401: %% more select
  402: select14(suite) -> [];
  403: select14(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  404:     [Node1,Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  405:     Tab1 = select14_ets,
  406:     Tab2 = select14_dets,
  407:     Tab3 = select14_remote,
  408:     Tab4 = select14_remote_dets,
  409:     Schemas = [[{name, Tab1}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  410: 	       [{name, Tab2}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}],
  411: 	       [{name, Tab3}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}],
  412: 	       [{name, Tab4}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {disc_only_copies, [Node2]}]],
  413:     [?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)) || Schema <- Schemas],
  414: 
  415:     %% Some Helpers
  416:     Trans = fun(Fun) -> mnesia:transaction(Fun) end,
  417:     Dirty = fun(Fun) -> mnesia:async_dirty(Fun) end,
  418:     LoopHelp = fun('$end_of_table',_) -> [];
  419: 		  ({Recs,Cont},Fun) ->
  420: 		       Sel = mnesia:select(Cont),
  421: 		       Recs ++ Fun(Sel, Fun)
  422: 	       end,
  423:     Loop = fun(Table,Pattern) ->
  424: 		   Sel = mnesia:select(Table, Pattern, 1, read),
  425: 		   Res = LoopHelp(Sel,LoopHelp),
  426: 		   case mnesia:table_info(Table, type) of
  427: 		       ordered_set -> Res;
  428: 		       _ -> lists:sort(Res)
  429: 		   end
  430: 	   end,
  431:     Test =
  432: 	fun(Tab) ->
  433: 		OneRec = {Tab, 1, 2},
  434: 		TwoRec = {Tab, 2, 3},
  435: 		OnePat = [{{Tab, '$1', 2}, [], ['$_']}],
  436: 		All = [OneRec,TwoRec],
  437: 		AllPat = [{'_', [], ['$_']}],
  438: 
  439: 		?match({atomic, []}, Trans(fun() -> Loop(Tab, OnePat) end)),
  440: 		?match({atomic, ok},   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  441: 		?match({atomic, ok},   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(TwoRec) end)),
  442: 		?match({atomic, [OneRec]}, Trans(fun() -> Loop(Tab, OnePat) end)),
  443: 		?match({atomic, All}, Trans(fun() -> Loop(Tab, AllPat) end)),
  444: 
  445: 		{atomic,{_, ContOne}} = Trans(fun() -> mnesia:select(Tab, OnePat, 1, read) end),
  446: 		?match({aborted, wrong_transaction}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:select(ContOne) end)),
  447: 		?match('$end_of_table',              Dirty(fun() -> mnesia:select(ContOne) end)),
  448: 
  449: 		{atomic,{_, ContAll}} = Trans(fun() -> mnesia:select(Tab, AllPat, 1, read) end),
  450: 		?match({aborted, wrong_transaction}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:select(ContAll) end)),
  451: 		?match({[_], _},                     Dirty(fun() -> mnesia:select(ContAll) end)),
  452: 
  453: 		?match({aborted, _}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:select(Tab, {match, '$1', 2},1,read) end)),
  454: 		?match({aborted, _}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:select(Tab, [{'_', [], '$1'}],1,read) end)),
  455: 		?match({aborted, _}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:select(sune) end)),
  456: 		?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:select(Tab, OnePat,1,read)),
  457: 		?match({aborted, {badarg,sune}},
  458: 		       Trans(fun() -> mnesia:select(sune) end))
  459: 	end,
  460:     Test(Tab1),
  461:     Test(Tab2),
  462:     Test(Tab3),
  463:     Test(Tab4),
  464:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  465: 
  466: 
  467: %% Pick all keys from table
  468: 
  469: all_keys(suite) ->[];
  470: all_keys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  471:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  472:     Tab = all_keys,
  473:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {type, bag}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  474:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  475: 
  476:     Write = fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 14, 4}) end,
  477:     AllKeys = fun() -> mnesia:all_keys(Tab) end,
  478: 
  479:     ?match({atomic, []},  mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
  480: 
  481:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:transaction(Write)),
  482:     ?match({atomic, [14]},  mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
  483: 
  484:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:transaction(Write)),
  485:     ?match({atomic, [14]},  mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
  486: 
  487:     ?match({aborted, _},
  488: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:all_keys(foo) end)),
  489:     ?match({aborted, _},
  490: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:all_keys([]) end)),
  491: 
  492:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:all_keys(Tab)),
  493:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  494: 
  495: 
  496: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  497: %% Use and misuse transactions
  498: 
  499: transaction(suite) -> [];
  500: transaction(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  501:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  502:     ?match({atomic, ali_baba}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> ali_baba end)),
  503:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(no_fun)),
  504:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(?MODULE, no_fun, [foo])),
  505: 
  506:     {success, [A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H]} =
  507:         ?start_activities(lists:duplicate(8, Node1)),
  508:     ?start_transactions([A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H]),
  509: 
  510:     A ! fun() -> mnesia:abort(abort_bad_trans) end,
  511:     ?match_receive({A, {aborted, abort_bad_trans}}),
  512: 
  513:     B ! fun() -> erlang:error(exit_here) end,
  514:     ?match_receive({B, {aborted, _}}),
  515: 
  516:     C ! fun() -> throw(throw_bad_trans) end,
  517:     ?match_receive({C, {aborted, {throw, throw_bad_trans}}}),
  518: 
  519:     D ! fun() -> exit(exit_bad_trans) end,
  520:     ?match_receive({D, {aborted, exit_bad_trans}}),
  521: 
  522:     E ! fun() -> exit(normal) end,
  523:     ?match_receive({E, {aborted, normal}}),
  524: 
  525:     F ! fun() -> exit(abnormal) end,
  526:     ?match_receive({F, {aborted, abnormal}}),
  527: 
  528:     G ! fun() -> exit(G, abnormal) end,
  529:     ?match_receive({'EXIT', G, abnormal}),
  530: 
  531:     H ! fun() -> exit(H, kill) end,
  532:     ?match_receive({'EXIT', H, killed}),
  533: 
  534:     ?match({atomic, ali_baba},
  535:            mnesia:transaction(fun() -> ali_baba end, infinity)),
  536:     ?match({atomic, ali_baba}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> ali_baba end, 1)),
  537:     ?match({atomic, ali_baba}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> ali_baba end, 0)),
  538:     ?match({aborted, Reason8} when element(1, Reason8) == badarg, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> ali_baba end, -1)),
  539:     ?match({aborted, Reason1} when element(1, Reason1) == badarg, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> ali_baba end, foo)),
  540:     Fun = fun() ->
  541: 		  ?match(true, mnesia:is_transaction()),
  542: 		  ?match({atomic, ok},
  543: 			 mnesia:transaction(fun() -> ?match(true, mnesia:is_transaction()),ok end)), ok end,
  544:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun)),
  545:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  546: 
  547: 
  548: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  549: transaction_counters(suite) -> [];
  550: transaction_counters(Config) ->
  551:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  552: 
  553:     {atomic, {{Participants1, Coordinators1}, {Participants2, Coordinators2}}} =
  554:         mnesia:transaction(fun get_transactions_counters/0),
  555: 
  556:     ?match(Coordinators1, Coordinators2),
  557:     ?match(Coordinators1, 1),
  558:     ?match(Participants1, Participants2),
  559:     ?match(Participants1, 0),
  560: 
  561:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  562: 
  563: get_transactions_counters() ->
  564:     {count_sides(mnesia_tm:get_transactions()), mnesia_tm:get_transactions_count()}.
  565: 
  566: count_sides(TransactionsList) ->
  567:     lists:foldl(
  568:         fun({_Tid, _Pid, participant}, {Participants, Coordinators}) -> {Participants + 1, Coordinators};
  569:             ({_Tid, _Pid, coordinator}, {Participants, Coordinators}) -> {Participants, Coordinators + 1}
  570:         end, {0, 0}, TransactionsList).
  571: 
  572: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  573: 
  574: %% ensure that nested transactions behave correctly
  575: %% We create a particular table that is used by this test only
  576: -record(ntab,  {a,  b}).
  577: basic_nested(doc) -> ["Test the basic functionality of nested transactions"];
  578: basic_nested(suite) -> [];
  579: basic_nested(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  580:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  581:     Args =  [{ram_copies,  Nodes},
  582: 	     {attributes,  record_info(fields,  ntab)}],
  583:     ?match({atomic,  ok},  mnesia:create_table(ntab,  Args)),
  584:     do_nested(top),
  585:     case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  586: 	false ->
  587: 	    lists:foreach(fun(N) ->
  588: 				  ?match({atomic,  ok},
  589: 					 mnesia:change_table_copy_type(ntab,  N,  disc_only_copies))
  590: 			  end,  Nodes),
  591: 	    do_nested(top);
  592: 	true ->
  593: 	    skip
  594:     end,
  595:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  596: 
  597: do_nested(How) ->
  598:     F1 = fun() ->
  599: 		mnesia:write(#ntab{a= 1}),
  600: 		mnesia:write(#ntab{a= 2})
  601: 	end,
  602:     F2 = fun() ->
  603: 		 mnesia:read({ntab,  1})
  604: 	 end,
  605:     ?match({atomic,  ok},  mnesia:transaction(F1)),
  606:     ?match({atomic,  _},  mnesia:transaction(F2)),
  607: 
  608:     ?match({atomic,  {aborted,  _}},
  609: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> n_f1(),
  610: 				mnesia:transaction(fun() -> n_f2() end)
  611: 		       end)),
  612: 
  613:     ?match({atomic,  {aborted,  _}},
  614: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> n_f1(),
  615: 				mnesia:transaction(fun() -> n_f3() end)
  616: 		       end)),
  617:     ?match({atomic,  {atomic,  [#ntab{a = 5}]}},
  618: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(#ntab{a = 5}),
  619: 				       mnesia:transaction(fun() -> n_f4() end)
  620: 			      end)),
  621:     Cyclic = fun() -> mnesia:abort({cyclic,a,a,a,a,a}) end,  %% Ugly
  622:     NodeNotR = fun() -> mnesia:abort({node_not_running, testNode}) end,
  623: 
  624:     TestAbort = fun(Fun) ->
  625: 			case get(restart_counter) of
  626: 			    undefined ->
  627: 				put(restart_counter, 1),
  628: 				Fun();
  629: 			    _ ->
  630: 				erase(restart_counter),
  631: 				ok
  632: 			end
  633: 		end,
  634: 
  635:     ?match({atomic,{atomic,ok}},
  636: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun()->mnesia:transaction(TestAbort,
  637: 							[Cyclic])end)),
  638: 
  639:     ?match({atomic,{atomic,ok}},
  640: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun()->mnesia:transaction(TestAbort,
  641: 							[NodeNotR])end)),
  642: 
  643:     %% Now try the restart thingie
  644:     case How of
  645: 	top ->
  646: 	    Pids = [spawn(?MODULE,  do_nested,  [{spawned,  self()}]),
  647: 		    spawn(?MODULE,  do_nested,  [{spawned,  self()}]),
  648: 		    spawn(?MODULE,  do_nested,  [{spawned,  self()}]),
  649: 		    spawn(?MODULE,  do_nested,  [{spawned,  self()}])],
  650: 	    ?match({info, _, _}, mnesia_tm:get_info(2000)),
  651: 	    lists:foreach(fun(P) -> receive
  652: 					{P,  ok} -> ok
  653: 				    end
  654: 			  end,  Pids),
  655: 	    ?match([],  [Tab || Tab <- ets:all(), mnesia_trans_store == ets:info(Tab, name)]);
  656: 
  657: 	{spawned,  Pid} ->
  658: 	    ?match({info, _, _}, mnesia_tm:get_info(2000)),
  659: 	    Pid ! {self(),  ok},
  660: 	    exit(normal)
  661:     end.
  662: 
  663: 
  664: n_f1() ->
  665:     mnesia:read({ntab,  1}),
  666:     mnesia:write(#ntab{a = 3}).
  667: 
  668: n_f2() ->
  669:     mnesia:write(#ntab{a = 4}),
  670:     erlang:error(exit_here).
  671: 
  672: n_f3() ->
  673:     mnesia:write(#ntab{a = 4}),
  674:     throw(funky).
  675: 
  676: n_f4() ->
  677:     mnesia:read({ntab,  5}).
  678: 
  679: 
  680: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  681: 
  682: nested_trans_both_ok(suite) -> [];
  683: nested_trans_both_ok(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  684:     nested_transactions(Config, ok, ok).
  685: 
  686: nested_trans_child_dies(suite) -> [];
  687: nested_trans_child_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  688:     nested_transactions(Config, abort, ok).
  689: 
  690: nested_trans_parent_dies(suite) -> [];
  691: nested_trans_parent_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  692:     nested_transactions(Config, ok, abort).
  693: 
  694: nested_trans_both_dies(suite) -> [];
  695: nested_trans_both_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  696:     nested_transactions(Config, abort, abort).
  697: 
  698: nested_transactions(Config, Child, Father) ->
  699:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  700:     Tab = nested_trans,
  701: 
  702:     Def =
  703: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  704: 	    true ->
  705: 		[{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, Nodes}];
  706: 	    false ->
  707: 		[{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1]},
  708: 		 {disc_copies, [Node2]}, {disc_only_copies, [Node3]}]
  709: 	end,
  710: 
  711:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def)),
  712:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, father, not_updated})),
  713:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, child, not_updated})),
  714: 
  715:     ChildOk = fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, child, updated}) end,
  716:     ChildAbort = fun() ->
  717: 			 mnesia:write({Tab, child, updated}),
  718: 			 erlang:error(exit_here)
  719: 		 end,
  720: 
  721:     Child_Fun =   % Depending of test case
  722: 	case Child of
  723: 	    ok -> ChildOk;
  724: 	    abort -> ChildAbort
  725: 	end,
  726: 
  727:     FatherOk = fun() -> mnesia:transaction(Child_Fun),
  728: 			mnesia:write({Tab, father, updated})
  729: 	       end,
  730: 
  731:     FatherAbort = fun() -> mnesia:transaction(Child_Fun),
  732: 			   mnesia:write({Tab, father, updated}),
  733: 			   erlang:error(exit_here)
  734: 		  end,
  735: 
  736:     {FatherRes, ChildRes} = % Depending of test case
  737: 	case Father of
  738: 	    ok -> ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(FatherOk)),
  739: 		  case Child of
  740: 		      ok -> {[{Tab, father, updated}], [{Tab, child, updated}]};
  741: 		      _ -> {[{Tab, father, updated}], [{Tab, child, not_updated}]}
  742: 		  end;
  743: 	    abort -> ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(FatherAbort)),
  744: 		     {[{Tab, father, not_updated}], [{Tab, child, not_updated}]}
  745: 	end,
  746: 
  747:     %% Synchronize things!!
  748:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, sync, sync}) end)),
  749: 
  750:     ?match(ChildRes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, child}])),
  751:     ?match(ChildRes, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, child}])),
  752:     ?match(ChildRes, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, child}])),
  753: 
  754:     ?match(FatherRes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, father}])),
  755:     ?match(FatherRes, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, father}])),
  756:     ?match(FatherRes, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, father}])),
  757:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  758: 
  759: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  760: mix_of_nested_activities(doc) ->
  761:     ["Verify that dirty operations in a transaction are handled like ",
  762:      "normal transactions"];
  763: mix_of_nested_activities(suite) ->   [];
  764: mix_of_nested_activities(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  765:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  766:     Tab = tab,
  767: 
  768:     Def =
  769: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  770: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
  771: 	    false ->
  772: 		[{ram_copies, [Node1]},
  773: 		 {disc_copies, [Node2]},
  774: 		 {disc_only_copies, [Node3]}]
  775: 	end,
  776: 
  777:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{type,bag}|Def])),
  778:     Activities = [transaction, sync_transaction,
  779: 		  ets, async_dirty, sync_dirty],
  780:     %% Make a test for all 3000 combinations
  781:     Tests = [[A,B,C,D,E] ||
  782: 		A <- Activities,
  783: 		B <- Activities,
  784: 		C <- Activities,
  785: 		D <- Activities,
  786: 		E <- Activities],
  787:     Foreach =
  788: 	fun(Test,No) ->
  789: 		Result = lists:reverse(Test),
  790: 		?match({No,Result},{No,catch apply_op({Tab,No},Test)}),
  791: 		No+1
  792: 	end,
  793:     lists:foldl(Foreach, 0, Tests),
  794:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  795: 
  796: apply_op(Oid,[Type]) ->
  797:     check_res(Type,mnesia:Type(fun() -> [Type|read_op(Oid)] end));
  798: apply_op(Oid = {Tab,Key},[Type|Next]) ->
  799:     check_res(Type,mnesia:Type(fun() ->
  800: 				       Prev = read_op(Oid),
  801: 				       mnesia:write({Tab,Key,[Type|Prev]}),
  802: 				       apply_op(Oid,Next)
  803: 			       end)).
  804: 
  805: check_res(transaction, {atomic,Res}) ->
  806:     Res;
  807: check_res(sync_transaction, {atomic,Res}) ->
  808:     Res;
  809: check_res(async_dirty, Res) when is_list(Res) ->
  810:     Res;
  811: check_res(sync_dirty, Res) when is_list(Res) ->
  812:     Res;
  813: check_res(ets, Res) when is_list(Res) ->
  814:     Res;
  815: check_res(Type,Res) ->
  816:     ?match({bug, bug},{Type,Res}).
  817: 
  818: read_op(Oid) ->
  819:     case lists:reverse(mnesia:read(Oid)) of
  820: 	[] -> [];
  821: 	[{_,_,Ops}|_] ->
  822: 	    Ops
  823:     end.
  824: 
  825: 
  826: %% Read matching records by using an index
  827: 
  828: index_match_object(suite) -> [];
  829: index_match_object(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  830:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  831:     Tab = index_match_object,
  832:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v, e]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  833:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  834:     ValPos = 3,
  835:     BadValPos = ValPos + 2,
  836:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
  837: 
  838:     ?match({atomic, []},
  839: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_match_object({Tab, '$1', 2}, ValPos) end)),
  840:     OneRec = {Tab, {1, 1}, 2, {1, 1}},
  841:     OnePat = {Tab, '$1', 2, '_'},
  842:     BadPat = {Tab, '$1', '$2', '_'},  %% See ref guide
  843: 
  844:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  845: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  846: 
  847:     Imatch = fun(Patt, Pos) ->
  848: 		     mnesia:transaction(fun() -> lists:sort(mnesia:index_match_object(Patt, Pos)) end)
  849: 	     end,
  850:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]}, Imatch(OnePat, ValPos)),
  851:     ?match({aborted, _}, Imatch(OnePat, BadValPos)),
  852:     ?match({aborted, _}, Imatch({foo, '$1', 2, '_'}, ValPos)),
  853:     ?match({aborted, _}, Imatch({[], '$1', 2, '_'}, ValPos)),
  854:     ?match({aborted, _}, Imatch(BadPat, ValPos)),
  855:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:index_match_object(OnePat, ValPos)),
  856: 
  857:     Another = {Tab, {3,1}, 2, {4,4}},
  858:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  859: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Another) end)),
  860:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  861: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, {4, 4}, 3, {4, 4}}) end)),
  862: 
  863:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]}, Imatch({Tab, {1,1}, 2, {1,1}}, ValPos)),
  864:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]}, Imatch({Tab, {1,1}, 2, '$1'}, ValPos)),
  865:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]}, Imatch({Tab, '$1', 2, {1,1}}, ValPos)),
  866:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]}, Imatch({Tab, '$1', 2, '$1'}, ValPos)),
  867:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]}, Imatch({Tab, {1, '$1'}, 2, '_'}, ValPos)),
  868:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]}, Imatch({Tab, {'$2', '$1'}, 2, {'_', '$1'}}, ValPos)),
  869:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec, Another]}, Imatch({Tab, '_', 2, '_'}, ValPos)),
  870: 
  871:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  872: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 4, 5, {7, 4}}) end)),
  873:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  874: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 7, 5, {7, 5}}) end)),
  875: 
  876:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 4, 5, {7, 4}}]}, Imatch({Tab, '$1', 5, {'_', '$1'}}, ValPos)),
  877: 
  878:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, transaction,
  879: 					[fun() ->
  880: 						lists:sort(mnesia:index_match_object({Tab, {1,1}, 2,
  881: 										      {1,1}}, ValPos))
  882: 					 end])),
  883:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  884: 
  885: %% Read records by using an index
  886: 
  887: index_read(suite) -> [];
  888: index_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  889:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  890:     Tab = index_read,
  891:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  892:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  893:     ValPos = 3,
  894:     BadValPos = ValPos + 1,
  895:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
  896: 
  897:     OneRec = {Tab, 1, 2},
  898:     ?match({atomic, []},
  899: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end)),
  900:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  901: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(OneRec) end)),
  902:     ?match({atomic, [OneRec]},
  903: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end)),
  904:     ?match({aborted, _},
  905: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, BadValPos) end)),
  906:     ?match({aborted, _},
  907: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(foo, 2, ValPos) end)),
  908:     ?match({aborted, _},
  909: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read([], 2, ValPos) end)),
  910: 
  911:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, no_transaction}},  mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)),
  912:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  913: 
  914: index_update_set(suite) -> [];
  915: index_update_set(Config)when is_list(Config) ->
  916:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  917:     Tab = index_test,
  918:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v1, v2, v3]}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
  919:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  920:     ValPos = v1,
  921:     ValPos2 = v3,
  922:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
  923: 
  924:     Pat1 = {Tab, '$1',  2,   '$2', '$3'},
  925:     Pat2 = {Tab, '$1', '$2', '$3', '$4'},
  926: 
  927:     Rec1 = {Tab, 1, 2, 3, 4},
  928:     Rec2 = {Tab, 2, 2, 13, 14},
  929:     Rec3 = {Tab, 1, 12, 13, 14},
  930:     Rec4 = {Tab, 4, 2, 13, 14},
  931: 
  932:     ?match({atomic, []},
  933: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end)),
  934:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  935: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec1) end)),
  936:     ?match({atomic, [Rec1]},
  937: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end)),
  938: 
  939:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  940: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec2) end)),
  941:     {atomic, R1} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
  942:     ?match([Rec1, Rec2], lists:sort(R1)),
  943: 
  944:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  945: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec3) end)),
  946:     {atomic, R2} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
  947:     ?match([Rec2], lists:sort(R2)),
  948:     ?match({atomic, [Rec2]},
  949: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_match_object(Pat1, ValPos) end)),
  950: 
  951:     {atomic, R3} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:match_object(Pat2) end),
  952:     ?match([Rec3, Rec2], lists:sort(R3)),
  953: 
  954:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  955: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec4) end)),
  956:     {atomic, R4} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
  957:     ?match([Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R4)),
  958: 
  959:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  960: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab, 4}) end)),
  961:     ?match({atomic, [Rec2]},
  962: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end)),
  963: 
  964:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
  965:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec4) end)),
  966:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
  967:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos2)),
  968: 
  969:     {atomic, R5} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:match_object(Pat2) end),
  970:     ?match([Rec3, Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R5)),
  971: 
  972:     {atomic, R6} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
  973:     ?match([Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R6)),
  974: 
  975:     ?match({atomic, []},
  976: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 4, ValPos2) end)),
  977:     {atomic, R7} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 14, ValPos2) end),
  978:     ?match([Rec3, Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R7)),
  979: 
  980:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec1) end)),
  981:     {atomic, R8} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
  982:     ?match([Rec1, Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R8)),
  983:     ?match({atomic, [Rec1]},
  984: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 4, ValPos2) end)),
  985:     {atomic, R9} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 14, ValPos2) end),
  986:     ?match([Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R9)),
  987: 
  988:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object(Rec2) end)),
  989:     {atomic, R10} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
  990:     ?match([Rec1, Rec4], lists:sort(R10)),
  991:     ?match({atomic, [Rec1]},
  992: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 4, ValPos2) end)),
  993:     ?match({atomic, [Rec4]},
  994: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 14, ValPos2) end)),

  997:     {atomic, R11} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),

 1001:

 1004: index_update_bag(suite) -> [];
 1005: index_update_bag(Config)when is_list(Config) ->
 1006:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1007:     Tab = index_test,
 1008:     Schema = [{name, Tab},
 1009: 	      {type, bag},
 1010: 	      {attributes, [k, v1, v2, v3]},
 1011: 	      {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
 1012:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1013:     ValPos = v1,
 1014:     ValPos2 = v3,
 1015: 
 1016:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1017: 
 1018:     Pat1 = {Tab, '$1',  2,   '$2', '$3'},
 1019:     Pat2 = {Tab, '$1', '$2', '$3', '$4'},
 1020:

 1022:     Rec2 = {Tab, 2, 2, 13, 14},
 1023:     Rec3 = {Tab, 1, 12, 13, 14},
 1024:     Rec4 = {Tab, 4, 2, 13, 4},

 1029: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end)),
 1030:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1031: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec1) end)),
 1032:     ?match({atomic, [Rec1]},
 1033: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end)),
 1034:

 1038:

 1040: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec2) end)),

 1042:     ?match([Rec1, Rec2], lists:sort(R1)),
 1043:

 1045: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec3) end)),

 1047:     ?match([Rec1, Rec2], lists:sort(R2)),

 1050:     ?match([Rec1, Rec2], lists:sort(R3)),
 1051:

 1053:     ?match([Rec1, Rec3, Rec2], lists:sort(R4)),
 1054: 
 1055:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1056: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec4) end)),
 1057:     {atomic, R5} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
 1058:     ?match([Rec1, Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R5)),
 1059:

 1061:     {atomic, R6} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
 1062:     ?match([Rec1, Rec2], lists:sort(R6)),
 1063: 
 1064:     %% OTP-6587  Needs some whitebox testing to see that the index table is cleaned correctly
 1065:

 1067:     ITab = mnesia_lib:val({index_test,{index, IPos}}),
 1068:     io:format("~n Index ~p @ ~p => ~p ~n~n",[IPos,ITab, ets:tab2list(ITab)]),
 1069:     %?match([{2,1},{2,2},{12,1}], lists:keysort(1,ets:tab2list(ITab))),
 1070: 
 1071:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec5) end)),
 1072:     {atomic, R60} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
 1073:     ?match([Rec1,Rec5,Rec2], lists:sort(R60)),
 1074:

 1079:     ?match([Rec1,Rec5,Rec2], lists:sort(R61)),

 1082:     %% ?match([{2,1},{2,2}], lists:keysort(1,ets:tab2list(ITab))),
 1083:

 1085:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec3) end)),
 1086:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object(Rec5) end)),
 1087:     {atomic, R6} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
 1088:     ?match([Rec1, Rec2], lists:sort(R6)),
 1089:     %% OTP-6587
 1090:

 1092:     ?match({atomic, [Rec2]},
 1093: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end)),
 1094:     {atomic, R7} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:match_object(Pat2) end),
 1095:     ?match([Rec3, Rec2], lists:sort(R7)),
 1096: 
 1097:     %% Two indexies
 1098:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1099:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec1) end)),
 1100:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Rec4) end)),
 1101:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1102:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos2)),
 1103:

 1108:     ?match([Rec1, Rec4], lists:sort(R9)),

 1111:

 1113:     {atomic, R11} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
 1114:     ?match([Rec1, Rec5, Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R11)),

 1122:     ?match([Rec5, Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R14)),

 1124: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 4, ValPos2) end)),
 1125:     {atomic, R15} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 14, ValPos2) end),
 1126:     ?match([Rec5, Rec3, Rec2], lists:sort(R15)),

 1130:     ?match([Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R16)),

 1132:     {atomic, R17} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 14, ValPos2) end),
 1133:     ?match([Rec3, Rec2], lists:sort(R17)),

 1137:     {atomic, R18} = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos) end),
 1138:     ?match([Rec2, Rec4], lists:sort(R18)),

 1145: 
 1146: index_write(suite) -> [];
 1147: index_write(doc) -> ["See ticket OTP-8072"];
 1148: index_write(Config)when is_list(Config) ->
 1149:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1150:     mnesia:create_table(a, [{index, [val]}]),
 1151:     mnesia:create_table(counter, []),
 1152: 
 1153:     CreateIfNonExist =
 1154: 	fun(Index) ->
 1155: 		case mnesia:index_read(a, Index, 3) of
 1156: 		    [] ->
 1157: 			Id = mnesia:dirty_update_counter(counter, id, 1),
 1158: 			New = {a, Id, Index},
 1159: 			mnesia:write(New),
 1160: 			New;
 1161: 		    [Found] ->
 1162: 			Found
 1163: 		end
 1164: 	end,
 1165: 
 1166:     Trans = fun(A) ->
 1167: 		    mnesia:transaction(CreateIfNonExist, [A])
 1168: 		    %% This works better most of the time
 1169: 		    %% And it is allowed to fail since it's dirty
 1170: 		    %% mnesia:async_dirty(CreateIfNonExist, [A])
 1171: 	    end,
 1172: 
 1173:     Self = self(),
 1174:     Update = fun() ->
 1175: 		     Res = lists:map(Trans, lists:seq(1,10)),
 1176: 		     Self ! {self(), Res}
 1177: 	     end,
 1178: 
 1179:     Pids = [spawn(Update) || _ <- lists:seq(1,5)],
 1180: 
 1181:     Gather = fun(Pid, Acc) -> receive {Pid, Res} -> [Res|Acc] end end,
 1182:     Results = lists:foldl(Gather, [], Pids),
 1183:     Expected = hd(Results),
 1184:     Check = fun(Res) -> ?match(Expected, Res) end,
 1185:     lists:foreach(Check, Results),
 1186:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1187: 
 1188: 
 1189: index_delete_object(suite) -> [];
 1190: index_delete_object(doc) -> ["See issue: GH-5040"];
 1191: index_delete_object(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1192:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1193:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:create_table(ram_set,[{index, [ix]}, {attributes, [key, ix, val]},
 1194:                                                 {ram_copies, Nodes}]),
 1195:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:create_table(do_set, [{index, [ix]}, {attributes, [key, ix, val]},
 1196:                                                 {disc_only_copies, Nodes}]),
 1197:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:create_table(ram_bag,[{index, [ix]}, {attributes, [key, ix, val]},
 1198:                                                 {ram_copies, Nodes}]),
 1199:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:create_table(do_bag, [{index, [ix]}, {attributes, [key, ix, val]},
 1200:                                                 {disc_only_copies, Nodes}]),
 1201:     Test = fun(Tab) ->
 1202:                    io:format("Testing: ~p~n",[Tab]),
 1203:                    Rec = {Tab, 2, 4, data},
 1204:                    Rec2 = {Tab, 3, 5, data},
 1205:                    ok = mnesia:dirty_write(Rec),
 1206:                    ok = mnesia:dirty_write(Rec2),
 1207:                    [Rec] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 4, ix),
 1208:                    ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete_object({Tab, 2, 4, does_not_exist})),
 1209:                    [Rec] = mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 2),
 1210:                    [Rec] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 4, ix),
 1211:                    ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete_object(Rec)),
 1212:                    [] = mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 2),
 1213:                    [] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 4, ix),
 1214:                    [Rec2] = mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 3),
 1215:                    [Rec2] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 5, ix)
 1216:            end,
 1217:     [Test(Tab) || Tab <- [ram_set,do_set,ram_bag,do_bag]],
 1218:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1219: 
 1220: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1221: %% Add and drop indices
 1222: 
 1223: 
 1224: add_table_index_ram(suite) -> [];
 1225: add_table_index_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1226:     add_table_index(Config, ram_copies).
 1227: 
 1228: add_table_index_disc(suite) -> [];
 1229: add_table_index_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1230:     add_table_index(Config, disc_copies).
 1231: 
 1232: add_table_index_disc_only(suite) -> [];
 1233: add_table_index_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1234:     add_table_index(Config, disc_only_copies).
 1235: 
 1236: %% Add table index
 1237: 
 1238: add_table_index(Config, Storage) ->
 1239:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1240:     Tab = add_table_index,
 1241:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {Storage, [Node1]}],
 1242:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1243:     ValPos = 3,
 1244:     BadValPos = ValPos + 1,
 1245:     ?match({aborted, Reason41 } when element(1, Reason41) == bad_type,
 1246:            mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, BadValPos)),
 1247:     ?match({aborted,Reason42 } when element(1, Reason42) == bad_type,
 1248:            mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, 2)),
 1249:     ?match({aborted, Reason43 } when element(1, Reason43) == bad_type,
 1250:            mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, 1)),
 1251:     ?match({aborted, Reason44 } when element(1, Reason44) == bad_type,
 1252:            mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, 0)),
 1253:     ?match({aborted, Reason45 } when element(1, Reason45) == bad_type,
 1254:            mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, -1)),
 1255:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1256:     ?match({aborted, Reason46 } when element(1, Reason46) == already_exists,
 1257:            mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1258: 
 1259:     NestedFun = fun() ->
 1260:                         ?match({aborted, nested_transaction},
 1261:                                mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1262:                         ok
 1263:                 end,
 1264:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(NestedFun)),
 1265:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1266: 
 1267: create_live_table_index_ram(suite) -> [];
 1268: create_live_table_index_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1269:     create_live_table_index(Config, ram_copies).
 1270: 
 1271: create_live_table_index_disc(suite) -> [];
 1272: create_live_table_index_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1273:     create_live_table_index(Config, disc_copies).
 1274: 
 1275: create_live_table_index_disc_only(suite) -> [];
 1276: create_live_table_index_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1277:     create_live_table_index(Config, disc_only_copies).
 1278: 
 1279: create_live_table_index(Config, Storage) ->
 1280:     [N1,N2,N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1281:     Tab = create_live_table_index,
 1282:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {Storage, Nodes}],
 1283:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1284:     ValPos = 3,
 1285:     mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 2}),
 1286: 
 1287:     Fun = fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 2, 2}) end,
 1288:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun)),
 1289:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1290:     IRead = fun() -> lists:sort(mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)) end,
 1291:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, 2},{Tab, 2, 2}]}, mnesia:transaction(IRead)),
 1292:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1293: 
 1294:     %% Bug when adding index when table is still unloaded
 1295:     %% By setting load order we hopefully will trigger the bug
 1296:     mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, N2, ram_copies),
 1297:     mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, N3, ram_copies),
 1298:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, N2, ram_copies)),
 1299:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, N3, ram_copies)),
 1300: 
 1301:     Create = fun(N) ->
 1302: 		     TabN = list_to_atom("tab_" ++ integer_to_list(N)),
 1303: 		     Def = [{ram_copies, Nodes}, {load_order, N}],
 1304: 		     mnesia:create_table(TabN, Def)
 1305: 	     end,
 1306: 
 1307:     ?match([{atomic,ok}|_], [Create(N) || N <- lists:seq(1,50)]),
 1308: 
 1309:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([N2,N3])),
 1310:     Ext = [{schema, ?BACKEND}],
 1311:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes,[N1]}|Ext]])),
 1312:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, start, [[{extra_db_nodes,[N1]}|Ext]])),
 1313: 
 1314:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1315: 
 1316:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, 2},{Tab, 2, 2}]}, mnesia:transaction(IRead)),
 1317:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, 2},{Tab, 2, 2}]},
 1318: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [IRead])),
 1319: 
 1320:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1321: 
 1322: %% Drop table index
 1323: 
 1324: del_table_index_ram(suite) ->[];
 1325: del_table_index_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1326:     del_table_index(Config, ram_copies).
 1327: 
 1328: del_table_index_disc(suite) ->[];
 1329: del_table_index_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1330:     del_table_index(Config, disc_copies).
 1331: 
 1332: del_table_index_disc_only(suite) ->[];
 1333: del_table_index_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1334:     del_table_index(Config, disc_only_copies).
 1335: 
 1336: del_table_index(Config, Storage) ->
 1337:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1338:     Tab = del_table_index,
 1339:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {Storage, [Node1]}],
 1340:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1341:     ValPos = 3,
 1342:     BadValPos = ValPos + 1,
 1343:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1344:     ?match({aborted,Reason} when element(1, Reason) == no_exists,
 1345:            mnesia:del_table_index(Tab, BadValPos)),
 1346:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1347: 
 1348:     ?match({aborted,Reason1} when element(1, Reason1) == no_exists,
 1349:            mnesia:del_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1350:     NestedFun =
 1351:         fun() ->
 1352:                 ?match({aborted, nested_transaction},
 1353:                        mnesia:del_table_index(Tab, ValPos)),
 1354:                 ok
 1355:         end,
 1356:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(NestedFun)),
 1357:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1358: 
 1359: 
 1360: idx_schema_changes_ram(suite) -> [];
 1361: idx_schema_changes_ram(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1362:     idx_schema_changes(Config, ram_copies).
 1363: idx_schema_changes_disc(suite) -> [];
 1364: idx_schema_changes_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1365:     idx_schema_changes(Config, disc_copies).
 1366: idx_schema_changes_disc_only(suite) -> [];
 1367: idx_schema_changes_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1368:     idx_schema_changes(Config, disc_only_copies).
 1369: 
 1370: idx_schema_changes(Config, Storage) ->
 1371:     [N1, N2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1372:     Tab = index_schema_changes,
 1373:     Idx = 3,
 1374:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {index, [Idx]}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {Storage, Nodes}],
 1375:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1376: 
 1377:     {Storage1, Storage2} =
 1378: 	case Storage of
 1379: 	    disc_only_copies ->
 1380: 		{ram_copies, disc_copies};
 1381: 	    disc_copies ->
 1382: 		{disc_only_copies, ram_copies};
 1383: 	    ram_copies ->
 1384: 		{disc_copies, disc_only_copies}
 1385: 	end,
 1386: 
 1387:     Write = fun(N) ->
 1388: 		    mnesia:write({Tab, N, N+50})
 1389: 	    end,
 1390: 
 1391:     [mnesia:sync_transaction(Write, [N]) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1392:     ?match([{Tab, 1, 51}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 51, Idx])),
 1393:     ?match([{Tab, 1, 51}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 51, Idx])),
 1394: 
 1395:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, N1, Storage1)),
 1396: 
 1397:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, sync_transaction, [Write, [17]])),
 1398:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, sync_transaction, [Write, [18]])),
 1399: 
 1400:     ?match([{Tab, 17, 67}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 67, Idx])),
 1401:     ?match([{Tab, 18, 68}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 68, Idx])),
 1402: 
 1403:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, N1)),
 1404:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, sync_transaction, [Write, [11]])),
 1405:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, sync_transaction, [Write, [12]])),
 1406: 
 1407:     ?match([{Tab, 11, 61}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 61, Idx])),
 1408:     ?match([{Tab, 12, 62}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 62, Idx])),
 1409: 
 1410:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, N2, N1)),
 1411:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, sync_transaction, [Write, [19]])),
 1412:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, sync_transaction, [Write, [20]])),
 1413: 
 1414:     ?match([{Tab, 19, 69}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 69, Idx])),
 1415:     ?match([{Tab, 20, 70}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 70, Idx])),
 1416: 
 1417:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, N2, Storage)),
 1418:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, sync_transaction, [Write, [13]])),
 1419:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, sync_transaction, [Write, [14]])),
 1420: 
 1421:     ?match([{Tab, 13, 63}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 63, Idx])),
 1422:     ?match([{Tab, 14, 64}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 64, Idx])),
 1423: 
 1424:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, N2, Storage2)),
 1425: 
 1426:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, sync_transaction, [Write, [15]])),
 1427:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, sync_transaction, [Write, [16]])),
 1428: 
 1429:     ?match([{Tab, 15, 65}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 65, Idx])),
 1430:     ?match([{Tab, 16, 66}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_index_read, [Tab, 66, Idx])),
 1431: 
 1432:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
